revised_title: A New Approach to the Theory of Turbulence
tldr: The author presents a new approach to the theory of turbulence by introducing correlations in the velocity components at two different points and times. This approach aims to incorporate phase relationships between Fourier components, which are essential for energy exchange in turbulence. The author derives a single equation for a scalar function based on the equations of motion and one additional statistical hypothesis, providing a more comprehensive understanding of the phenomenon of turbulence.
